alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Morgan; Shelby (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 7:24PM EDT until July 17 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Shelby County in central Indiana... Northeastern Morgan County in central Indiana... Central Johnson County in central Indiana... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 723 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mooresville, or 18 miles southwest of Indianapolis, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Bargersville around 735 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Franklin, New Whiteland, Whiteland and Trafalgar. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 87 and 95. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
